page.title: 03 RAILWAYS OF WEEDON BEC
page.content: The railway through Weedon begins in London at {Euston Station} and ended originally in Birmingham.Nowadays it is known as the {West Coast Main Line.} There used to be a station in Weedon where a branch line ran to {Leamington Spa.}This has been closed for a long time. The goods siding to the {Royal Military Depot} has also been closed for a long time.It used to carry guns and ammunition into the depot. Today all the passenger trains are pulled by electric locomotives and go through Weedon at over 100 m.p.h.Some goods trains still have diesel engines. There have been two train crashes near Weedon.
